Content: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Sri Lanka Railways has commenced a special service, with effect from today (August 04), for devotees traveling to Thalawila for the annual feast of the St. Anne’s church. The department has also taken steps to extend the final destinations of several trains operating on the Colombo-Puttalam railway line until the 7th of this month. Further, special train services will also be in operation from Colombo to Palavi and Moratuwa to Palavi.
